test-automation.title: Test Automation
test-automation.description: Designing and implementing automated test frameworks for UI and data validation across multiple applications.
examples: Built complete UI automation framework from scratch using Robot Framework and SeleniumLibrary
Developed Databricks automation workflows for large-scale ETL data validation
Integrated Azure DevOps pipelines for continuous test execution
Serve as primary QA automation engineer for 2 production applications

data-quality.title: Data Quality & Validation
data-quality.description: Ensuring data accuracy and integrity through comprehensive validation strategies across large-scale database systems.
examples: Perform complex data comparisons and count validations using TOAD for Oracle
Validate VBAC and data tokenization processes against business requirements
Build parallel ETL scripts to compare DEV and QA data outputs for exact matches
Work with enterprise-scale databases containing millions of records

etl-testing.title: ETL Testing
etl-testing.description: Validating Extract, Transform, Load processes by developing independent QA ETL scripts and comparing outputs against development implementations.
examples: Develop QA ETL scripts in parallel with DEV team based on BRDs
Create comparison frameworks to validate DEV ETL outputs in SIT environment
Use PySpark and SQL to replicate business logic for data transformation validation
Ensure exact data parity between QA and DEV ETL pipeline outputs

test-design.title: Test Strategy & Design
test-design.description: Creating comprehensive test strategies aligned with business requirements and technical specifications.
examples: Design test cases based on Business Requirements Documents (BRDs)
Develop advanced testing strategies for complex data tokenization scenarios
Create validation frameworks for both UI and backend data consistency
Leverage AI tools to optimize and automate manual testing workflows

automation.title: Test & Process Automation
automation.description: Building automation solutions to reduce manual effort and increase testing efficiency.
examples: Automated repetitive manual tasks using AI-powered solutions
Built end-to-end UI test automation from requirements to execution
Created Databricks workflow automations for scheduled data validations
Integrated CI/CD pipelines for automated test execution on code deployment

web-scraping.title: Web Scraping
web-scraping.description: Large-scale data extraction from websites for research and machine learning applications.
examples: Scraped millions of data points from Google Arts & Culture and Wikidata for NBER-published ML research
Collected 630,000+ paintings with metadata (artist info, dates, countries) for economic development study
Implemented anti-bot detection bypass strategies to scrape protected Google platforms
Handled dynamic content challenges including infinite scroll and lazy-loaded images

data-mining.title: Data Mining

examples: Collected millions of data points for NBER research analyzing economic development through historical art
Mined structured and unstructured data from Google Arts & Culture and Wikidata APIs
Processed metadata for 630,000+ paintings including temporal, geographic, and artist information
Contributed to ML algorithm development for predicting emotions in historical artworks

Handled dynamic JavaScript content with infinite scroll and lazy-loaded images
Implemented strategic delays and human-like browsing patterns to bypass detection systems
Scraped millions of data points across multiple web platforms for ML research

data-monitoring.title: Data Monitoring
data-monitoring.description: Continuous monitoring of user behavior, data flows, and systems for security threats and policy violations.

Tracked user behavior patterns including data extractions, communications, and web traffic
Identified anomalous activities and potential security violations through behavioral analysis
Maintained watchlists for ongoing monitoring of high-risk user activities

incident-response.title: Incident Response
incident-response.description: Investigating and responding to security incidents, managing user communications, and enforcing regulatory compliance.
examples: Assessed and classified security incidents based on threat level and regulatory requirements
Executed response actions including user warnings (template emails), escalations, and account restrictions
Communicated directly with flagged users to explain violations and regulatory procedures
Managed watchlist creation for users requiring ongoing monitoring and investigation

Implemented mobile-first design patterns ensuring cross-device compatibility
Created modular, reusable React components aligned with product requirements
Ensured frontend components remained flexible to accommodate evolving backend API structures

Enhanced visual polish through strategic spacing, soft dividers, and hover state animations
Developed consistent button and link styling aligned with product design expectations
Improved overall usability through thoughtful interaction patterns and visual feedback
